description:
Say goodbye to carrying a large cooler to the lake – wheel it there instead. The super-rugged Tundra Haul Cooler has all the insulation you need to keep food and drinks safely chilled for hours on end. Add 2 padlocks to the corners (sold separately), and the Tundra is certified to be bearproof too. Trail-worthy wheels resist impact and punctures so you can tackle rocky, rooty terrain with no worries, and a T-Bar handle makes it easy to tow when you leave base camp.

  • Roto-moulded construction is durable with exceptional impact resistance
  • 5cm thick Permafrost Insulation in body and 7.6cm in lid
  • Aluminum rod reinforced lid with integrated self-stopping hinge won't hyper-extend
  • Textured lid is grippy and super-strong (use it as a standing or sitting surface)
  • EPDM rubber full-coverage seal eliminates air exchange
  • NeverFlat™ wheels are impact- and puncture-resistant
  • Aluminum T-Bar handle for comfortable and reliable hauling
  • Robust rubber T-latches keep contents secure
  • Integrated tie-down slots keep it in-place while still allowing on-the-go access
  • Vortex drain system is leakproof
  • Accommodates 45, 355ml cans when using recommended 2:1 ice to beverage ratio
name: Yeti Tundra Haul Hard Cooler
